items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 40 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 9!
Hungarian breweries are popping up at a rapid pace, expanding the beer, or sör, culture of the country of Hungary. That's 15 different beers from a brewery from Hungary.  Try 5 more for Level 4!

Bier macht schön!

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 25 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 6! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 250 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 51!

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 30 check-ins with a photo.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 30 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 7!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
